summary: upcoming fics
body:
upcoming fics

drunk bucky | hc

what drunk!bucky would act like

bucky at parties | hc

what bucky does at parties

bucky being touch starved | hc

bucky being touch starved & how you two show your love

one coffee please | steve rogers

summary: steve meets you at a coffee shop & he decides to get back into art

hurt me | bucky barnes

summary: you & bucky have had some beef ever since you became an Avenger. but when someone breaks into the tower, you have to set your differences aside.

clueless | peter parker

summary: peter likes you. you like peter. but he is too clueless to realize that

reality | bucky barnes

summary: bucky has a nightmare & you bring him back to reality

love you | bucky barnes

summary: you & bucky show how much you love each other

peter & glasses | hc

when peter wears his glasses

»»»»

summary:
*talking about a fanfiction Emily is writing*
Emily; I lied to you...about something in the fanfic
Myself; WhAT?! Omg!
Emily;...
body:
*talking about a fanfiction Emily is writing*

Emily; I lied to you…about something in the fanfic

Myself; WhAT?! Omg!

Emily; You’re going to be pissed at me.

Myself; I won’t be pissed at you. I hope it isn’t too bad..

Emily; Oh, baby girl, it’s bad.

Myself; *does a high pitched scream* WHAT?! NOOOOOOODVXJBD

@peteyb-parker

summary:
WHAT IF Tony accidentally sends a nude to Peter with a reeeeally dirty text to go along with it...
Tony: Hey baby, wanna spread...
body:
WHAT IF Tony accidentally sends a nude to Peter with a reeeeally dirty text to go along with it…

Tony: Hey baby, wanna spread your legs wide apart and tie them to the bed so you’re all open and waiting for me, then I’m gonna pound you so hard you’ll forget your own name 😏

He meant to send it to Pepper but he’s been drinking and their names look so alike and they’re right next to each other on his contact list…

aaaand Peter goes right ahead and sends one back with an equally dirty text to go with it

Peter: Mm yes daddy, please fill me up with your massive cock and make me scream 😉

Tony’s like “oh shit” because some part of him knows it’s wrong - he’s in a relationship, he’s 30 years older than Peter and Peter’s only a teenager…

But he cant stop staring at the picture Peter sent and he can’t stop re-reading the text. He knows there’s no way he can’t reply and he also knows he’s going to hell.

Because holy shit, Tony thinks, I’m attracted to Peter Parker.

summary: Disneyland Ruckus
body:
Disneyland Ruckus

*Stephen holds up a picture of Tony and Peter*

Stephen: Have you seen these two?

Employee A: No sir. Would you like me to make an announcement?

Stephen: Ye-

Employee B: *walks over* A couple of idiots are causing a scene in Tomorrowland.

Stephen: *really hoping it’s not who he thinks they are* What do they look like?

Employee B: One looks suspiciously like Tony Stark and the other is a teenager.

Stephen: *groans loudly* Those are my idiots.

Peter Parker is the youngest MIT student in eons - but he isn’t smart enough to not give in to his massive crush on Professor Stark.

summary: The shirt tony is wearing in the internship photo is from Peter. But Peter got the wrong size and makes Tony go to Walmart with...
question: The shirt tony is wearing in the internship photo is from Peter. But Peter got the wrong size and makes Tony go to Walmart with him.
answer:
Thank you so much @cakebatterbowl for sending in the request! this was such a cute idea, I hope I did it justice!!

PLEASE FEEL FREE TO REQUEST HEADCANON IDEAS!!

  • Peter bought the shirt with good intentions, he just wasn’t sure of the size.
  • best believe he called Happy to figure it out but no one ever picked up.
  • So he did the only thing he could think of and went on Google and typed
  • What size of shirt is Tony Stark?
  • Walla! a bunch of responses came in, saying that he was a size X-Large due to superhero training and many other reasons which convinced Peter
  • He asked his Aunt May to drop him off at Wal-Mart, so his search for a perfect shirt for Mr. Stark began.
  • Peter found a lot of science punny shirts but he didn’t think they were up to the standard until he saw one that caught his interest.
  • It was a plain black shirt with a comparison graph of a single drawing that looked both like a Rabbit and a Duck, looking at it in different angles.
  • Grabbing a size X-L, Peter made his way to the checkout station.


  • The day he was going to gift it to Tony, Peter was nervous
  • Like here he is gifting the richest man in the world a shirt from Wal-Mart that cost him less than $10
  • Sweaty palms
  • Peter’s hands were clammy when he gave Tony the shirt.
  • “Thanks, kid. I like the shirt and all, but umm… ?” Tony asked as he saw the size
  • “Well, this shirt isn’t exactly my size Kid. Where’d you get the idea that I’m an XL?” Tony asked laughing at the situation when he put the shirt against himself to see it almost reach his knee-caps
  • Peter felt the color leave his face, It made more sense now, that the shirt was, in fact, sizes too big
  • “I saw it on the internet…” Peter mumbled feeling embarrassed
  • Tony would just laugh because he thought the whole situation was really endearing and Peter actually made his day bc he never thought he’d receive a present from him. 


  • Tony and Peter were currently on their way to the Wal-Mart Peter had gone to
  • “Tell me again why we’re urgently going to Wal-Mart again kid?” 
  • “Today’s the last day to get it exchanged! I have the receipt somewhere here, hold on.” 
  • Peter found the receipt in his wallet, he was thankful he hadn’t thrown it away
  • Tony would find the whole situation very pure & sofT
  • When they got there Peter basically dashed to the section in which he found the shirt 
  • “MR. STARK! MR. STARK IT’S OVER HERE!” 
  • Low-key embarrassing Tony, but he got over it bc it’s his boy Peter who just wants to give him a gift :’)) and he looks so happy doing it :’))))))
  • Tony got the correct size and they headed to the exchange counter. 


  • Tony dropped Peter home after the purchase exchange
  • “Thanks for the shirt kid. See ya!” 
  • Best believe that Tony told Pepper, Rhodey, FRIDAY, his suit, his robot family all about it and couldn’t stop smiling at the memory
  • Peter 100% talked about it to Aunt May, Ned, MJ, the sandwich shop guy, robbers, anyone
  • they were 1000000% happy


  • When Tony & Peter were holding their ‘internship’ reunion thing, Peter’s heart was about to burst when he saw what Tony was wearing
  • It’s the shirt I gave him!!!!!!!!
  • Proud! Tony all the way!
  • He wore the shirt with pride as his pseudo-son got it for him, and hell there’s nothing more precious than that
  • “Thanks for the shirt Kid, it’s one of my favorites so far. Quite comfy.”
  • “Y-yeah! no problem Mr. Stark!”
  • Peter was 100% giddy bc Tony actually liked the shirt and didn’t mind that it was from Wal-Mart
